person.persName: William Grose (Colonel, 36th Regiment Indiana Volunteer Infantry)

body.p: Indiana attorney and soldier. Dayton, Ohio, native. Studied law in New Castle, Indiana. Attorney in New Castle. Unsuccessful Democratic candidate for Congress in 1852. Delegate to the Republican National Convention in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1856. Elected judge of local common pleas court in New Castle. in 1860. Commissioned Colonel of the 36th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment, on October 1861. Commissioned brigadier general on July 30, 1864. Commanded a brigade and later a division in the Army of the Cumberland from 1862 to 1865.
